alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 8:34PM EDT until July 10 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DELTA...SOUTHEASTERN MARQUETTE AND SOUTHWESTERN ALGER COUNTIES... At 833 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rock, or 28 miles southwest of Munising, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, Trenary, Lathrop, McFarland, Diffin and Round Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
